#summary How to use Xapian's spelling correction feature within Djapian

= Using the spelling correction feature of Xapian with Djapian =

Here is a code example. This code could be placed inside a view in your Django project, for example.

{{{
from your.models import search_index
from xapian import QueryParser

# As defined at http://www.xapian.org/docs/apidoc/html/classXapian_1_1QueryParser.html
search_flags = QueryParser.FLAG_PHRASE | QueryParser.FLAG_BOOLEAN | \
               QueryParser.FLAG_LOVEHATE | QueryParser.FLAG_WILDCARD | \
               QueryParser.FLAG_SPELLING_CORRECTION
    
results = search_index.search("What to search", flags=search_flags)
corrected_query = search_index.get_corrected_query_string()
}}}
